definition: abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)

sentences.english: The epidemic was stopped before the annual pilgrimage to Mecca got under way.
sentences.chinese: 這傳染病在一年一度進行麥加朝聖之前停止。

sentences.english: One of the Meccas for the leading physicists of that time was in Gottingen.
sentences.chinese: 那個時候引導物理學家的麥加聖地之一，是哥廷根。

sentences.english: Ruled by the Turks until1916, Jidda has long been used as a port by Moslem pilgrims making the journey to Mecca.
sentences.chinese: 吉達長期以來是穆斯林朝聖者通往麥加城的旅行港口。

sentences.english: Others again adopt an orientation of the rectangular shrine itself.
sentences.chinese: 寺的方向，必須朝着麥加的聖殿“克爾白”這一要求。

sentences.english: Many Moslem pilgrims go to Mecca every year.
sentences.chinese: 每年很多回教朝聖者到麥加。

sentences.english: The Mercalli Scale is based on observable earthquake damage.
sentences.chinese: 麥加利烈度是由可觀測地震破壞確定的。

sentences.english: Most of the passengers at the airport were people going to Makkah to perform Umrah.
sentences.chinese: 機場的大多數乘客是要去麥加參加副朝的。

sentences.english: The Golden Mean Miracle is in the Mecca Verse of the Koran.
sentences.chinese: 黃金分割的奇蹟也存在於古蘭經中關於麥加的章節裏。

sentences.english: Mosques are oriented so that the mihrab faces Mecca.
sentences.chinese: 清真寺會決定朝向使米哈拉布能朝向麥加。

sentences.english: Muslim worshippers circle the Kaaba at Mecca's Grand Mosque during Ramadan.
sentences.chinese: 穆斯林朝聖者聚集在麥加的大清真寺周圍。

sentences.english: Mecca already boasts dozens of fancy international hotels.
sentences.chinese: 麥加爲已擁有數十家富麗堂皇的國際酒店而自豪。

sentences.english: After all, Maiga is professional origin. Even his opening moves are 200 scores.
sentences.chinese: 人家麥加畢竟是專業出身，出手就是200多分。

sentences.english: He at last left Mecca on a night in AD 1728.
sentences.chinese: 他最後於公元1728年的一個晚上離開了麥加。

sentences.english: At her death, she was buried outside Makkah in a grave dug by the Prophet himself.
sentences.chinese: 她歸真後，葬在麥加外穆聖親自挖的一個墳墓裏。

sentences.english: Muslim worshippers circle the Kaaba at Mecca's Grand Mosque during Ramadan.
sentences.chinese: 齋月期間，聚集在麥加大清真寺外的穆斯林朝聖者。

sentences.english: Just Passing Thru is the latest 2008 CD Release from Janet McGarry.
sentences.chinese: 只要從是最新的2008年之前珍妮麥加里。

pinyin: Yi1 bi3 li4 ya4 Ban4 dao3

definition: to go to church on Sunday (of Christians)
spiritual leader (of a nation or church)/religious leader
